name: Custom Mini-Character portrait!
description:
You name the character, and I will make an adorable version of it for you! It will be so adorable and compact that your life will be redefined by the awesomeness.

3" x 3", acrylic, watercolor and ink on canvas.

Buy 4 or more and they're only $10 each! Flat rate shipping!

Images are for demonstration purposes and are likely not for sale.

[PS : I'll also do your City of Heroes, Craft of Worldwar and Dragon Puncher XI characters too!]

name: Custom ACEO Trading Card
description:
You name the medium, you name the subject, you name the everything - and get some 2.5" x 3.5" original artwork from a super-awesome Star Wars trading card artist guy! That's me!

After making around 100 ACEOs for individuals & working with Topps, now's your change to get a super cheap work of original artwork. All images below are samples and not currently for sale - and best of all, shipping is FREE!

Buy 5 and get a 6th one free!
